Sneak Attack (Melee) Information

Deal extra damage to a foe you have Advantage against. Also works if you have an ally within 1.5m of the target and you don't have Disadvantage Type: Action Melee Weapon requirement: Finesse Weapon on your main hand (will use your highest attribute). Range: 1.5m Recharge: Once Per Turn
